name: Landhaus Daum Andrea
description:
Our villa thumb is in a perfect location for a winter and a summer vacation.
The autumn 2012 RENORVIERTEN apartments are designed for 2 to 14 people.

In our country house we rent:

- Apartment PENKEN for 2 - 6 persons
- Apartment MAPLE for 5-8 persons
- Both together for max. 14 people
Cot is also available
We will gladly provide you an offer. Please write us an e-mail request or call us.
Our villa thumb is in a perfect location for a winter and a summer vacation. The autumn 2012 RENORVIERTEN apartments are designed for 2 to 14 people .

Our facilities :
Bath / shower / toilet, towels , bed linen, sofa bed, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker, toaster , kettle, FREE WIFI ! , House -gear, balcony, storage room for Schi-/Schuhe boot dryer !

Winter:
Schibuseinstieg right outside the front door , 2 minutes drive to the ski area Horberg , ski school, ski hire and apres-ski , 5 minutes drive to the ski resort Mayrhofen ( Penken, maple) !

summer:
Leisure facility Hippach / Mayrhofen in 1 minute HIKE ! to reach!
The outdoor pool Hippach, Tennisplkätze , beach volleyball courts, basketball court, soccer field and Funcord located directly behind the house and are therefore easily accessible within minutes .
An outdoor pool in Mayrhofen is also just 4 km .


summer:
Leisure facility Hippach / Mayrhofen in 1 minute HIKE ! to reach! !

Your apartment is generally ready from 14 clock. If you arrive later than 20 clock we ask you to inform us in advance.

The apartment must be left to 10 clock.
The holiday region of Mayrhofen-Hippach is located at the end of the Ziller Valley, at the valley in the four valleys Ziller, Stillupgrund, Zemmgrund and Tux valley divides, at an altitude of 630 m above sea level. The holiday region includes the municipalities of: Mayrhofen, Brandberg, Ginzling Hippach, Ramsau and Schwendau.
About the Inn valley motorway A12 to the Zillertal exit and from there another 30 km on the Zillertal Highway No. B169 until after Schwendau.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
Apartment PENKEN for 2-6 people:

- Comfortable fully equipped kitchen with dining area and sofa bed (sofa bed)
- 1 bedroom with a double bed and 2 single beds, plus a large sofa bed
- Bathroom with shower and WC
- Hallway with cloakroom
- Balcony

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: This 140m ² apartment has 3 bedrooms with double beds, hall with toilet, large bathroom with shower and toilet, living room with large sofa bed, dining for 8 Perone, Fully Equipped Kitchen, hallway with cloakroom, balcony, Wi-Fi, ski storage room with ski boot dryer u . ski rack on the ground floor, garden and terrace with garden furniture.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Appartement Kristall
- fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, fridge with freezer, ceranfield with 4 cooking-fields, stovepipe, microwave, coffee-machine, toaster, water-cooker
- TV, radio, sleeping-couch
- eating-room for7 persons
- bathroom with shower/WC, towels 1 per week inclusive 
- 2 sleeping-rooms with 2 doublerooms and 1singleroom 
- a cot and highchair a available free of charge
- bed linen inclusive
- free WIFI
- own entrance
- garderober
- terrasse ca. 30 m² 
- storeroom for ski/shoes incl.  skishoe dryer 
- two parkingspots per flat direct in front of the house for free
